lines: dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
sku gsum ye shes ngo bo nyid
'gro ba'i gnyen mchog rje btsun mas
bdag la sku'i byin rlabs stsol
ces bas lan gsum du gsol ba btab
mdun skyed kyi rje btsun ma dang
mar me gcig las gnyis mched pa'i tshul du
sngags kyi phreng ba de 'dra gnyis pa 'phros
bla ma'i thugs ka nas brgyud de zhal nas 'thon
slob ma rje btsun mar gsal ba'i zhal nas zhugs
thugs kar zla ba'i steng du 'khod par mos nas
sngags kyi rjes zlos brgya rtsa brgyad bya
bcom ldan bdag gis bzung lags kyis
bcom ldan bdag la byin gyis rlobs
ces gsol ba lan gsum bzlas pa'i rjes
de nas 'brang rgyas slob ma'i sbyi
